DefaultPrefix:
/interface wireguard
add listen-port={server-port} name={interface} private-key="{server-private}"

/ip address
add address={server-address} interface={interface}

/interface wireguard peers
DefaultCommand: add allowed-address={client-address} comment="peer {client-id}" interface="{interface}" preshared-key="{client-preshared}" public-key="{client-public}"
